DOC.brief_summary: Re-read of brain amyloid scans acquired in previous AV-45 clinical studies by readers trained using updated reading methodology. The scans in this study came from subjects who had Alzheimer's Disease (AD) or Mild Cognitive Impairment (MCI).
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Inter-reader Reliability Using Images From Subjects With Alzheimer's Disease (AD) or Mild Cognitive Impairment (MCI)
DOC.criteria: Participants: Inclusion Criteria AD: Male or female >=50 years of age Meet National Institute of Neurological and Communicative Disorders and Stroke (NINCDS) criteria for probable AD with MiniMental State Examination (MMSE) score of 1024 Inclusion Criteria MCI: Male or female >=50 years of age Have a Clinical Dementia Rating (CDR) of 0.5 MMSE >24 Have a history or current diagnosis of other neurologic disease Have had or currently have a diagnosis of other neurodegenerative disease Have participated in experimental therapy targeted to amyloid plaque Readers: â€¢Private nuclear medicine physicians with no prior training in reading florbetapirPET scans
